name: Over Powered Man
description:
Your fist is invincible, you are not.

You are the last superhero left to defend mankind against a relentless horde of machines. Your only weapon is your fist.

Left click to punch, hold to swipe. Destroying each machine improves your stats. Range - how far your fist can reach. Power - the amount of momentum carried by each punch. Regen - how fast your energy recharges (tip: don't spend too much energy at the start of the game).

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Message from Dr [REDACTED]: You are [REDACTED]. The health bar is a lie. Your body has survived anything from [REDACTED] to [REDACTED]. (see Addendum 3A).

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits to Bryce for the awesome music.
